name: Edd's Problem
description:
Edd's Problem is a short game developed in Rpg maker Vx Ace.

The game deals with a girl named Edd. She is the frontman of the local rock band. One day she knows that her concert has been canceled. And you need to find out the reason for this and help Edd

WARNING: The game contains questionable content

I wish you luck and enjoyable game!
